name: List.Zipper

values.name: after
values.comment: Returns all elements after the element the `Zipper` is focussed on

values.name: before
values.comment: Returns all elements before the element the `Zipper` is focussed on.

values.name: current
values.comment: Returns the element the `Zipper` is currently focussed on.

values.name: find
values.comment: Returns a `Zipper` focussed on the first element for which the predicate returns `True` (starting from a given `Zipper`).

values.name: first
values.comment: Move the focus to the first element of the list.

values.name: fromList
values.comment: Construct a `Zipper` from a list. The `Zipper` will focus on the first element (if there is a first element).

values.name: last
values.comment: Move the focus to the last element of the list.

values.name: map
values.comment: Apply a function to every element in the `Zipper`.

values.name: mapAfter
values.comment: Apply a function to all elements after the element the `Zipper` is focussed on.
values.type: (List a -> List a) -> List.Zipper.Zipper a -> List.Zipper.Zipper a

values.name: mapBefore
values.comment: Apply a function to all elements before the element the `Zipper` is focussed on.
values.type: (List a -> List a) -> List.Zipper.Zipper a -> List.Zipper.Zipper a

values.name: mapCurrent
values.comment: Apply a function to the element the `Zipper` is focussed on.

values.name: next
values.comment: Move the focus to the element after the element the `Zipper` is currently focussed on (if there is such an element).

values.name: previous
values.comment: Move the focus to the element before the element the `Zipper` is currently focussed on (if there is such an element).

values.name: singleton
values.comment: Construct a `Zipper` focussed on the first element of a singleton list.

values.name: withDefault
values.comment: Provide an alternative when constructing a `Zipper` fails.
